      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String id,
            java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String password)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Login method. write to log file if login success/faild.
        Parameters:
        id - UI input client ID;
        userName - UI input client login user name.
        password - UI input client login password.
        Returns:
        true if login success, false if login faild.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(double amount,
            Operation.Description description)
              throws NotEnoughBalanceException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Withdraw method. call client account withdraw method.
        Parameters:
        amount - the money amount to withdraw.
        description - withdraw type cash or check or commission or iterest.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughBalanceException - in case not enough balance in the account.
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.

      • deposit

        public void deposit(double amount,
           Operation.Description description)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    NotEnoughBalanceException
        Deposit method. call client account deposit method.
        Parameters:
        amount - the money amount to deposit.
        description - deposit type cash or check or commission or iterest.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughBalanceException - not relevant in account class.
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.
